ModMetaData.name: Realistic Chocolate Production Continued [1.0][1.1][1.2]
ModMetaData.author: troopersmith1 - CrunchyDuck, Oken
ModMetaData.description:
Makes cocoa trees produce raw cocoa, that has to be prepared at a cooking station to make chocolate, or milk chocolate.
Also includes a patch for VGP's Cocoa Bush to have it also produce Cocoa instead of Chocolate.
